title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2102.4 - Audit report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2102.4 - Audit report

State Regulations
A report outlining the findings of the auditors will be
sent to the lender or school for comment. Until the lender or school responds
within a reasonable time not to exceed 90 days, the report will remain
confidential. Unless the lender or school shows cause why the report should not
be made public, it will become a public record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2102.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
